website_summaries.verdict: This 3-piece galvanized steel tetherball set is a good option for children and includes a pump and soft ball.
pros: A basic, value-priced tetherball set for children that's easy to install and can be temporarily removed
Assembly is straightforward, and the included pump is convenient
We like the forgiving softness of the ball, which makes it ideal for younger children
cons: The thin steel is fairly flimsy, making this set unsuitable for rougher play

customer_reviews.title: May be good for small children but serious play causes metal fatigue ...
customer_reviews.text: The pole is a flimsy galvanized metal tube in three pieces. May be good for small children but serious play causes metal fatigue and breakage at the point where the pole exits the cement encased sleeve. Only lasted four days with my kids. You’d be better off placing a 10’ piece of 1 1/2” galvanized conduit with an eye bolt installed at the top and just purchasing the ball with tether. Wish I had.
customer_reviews.author: Scott W. Gross

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and tough
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, absolutely perfect. I didn't expect this to be anything more then something for my 4 year old to play with, but my teens and adult friends took it over last week. They were rough and definitely not playing by the rules. It with stood the abuse. I had it in the ground without cement.. while it was a little loose after the adults, it's nothing cement would not be able to fix. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Phat Turtle

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: We have had this almost a year. We leave the ball outside and it has faded but held up well. You do need to concrete in the base but its easy with one bag of mix. I had to replace the rope once but I am pretty sure that is because my grown husband and another man were in a very, very, intense tether ball match!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Wittnebert

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and value!
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived in perfect condition. Each piece of tube is individually wrapped and is easy to see just by looking, how it’s meant to go together. Got two 50# bags of fast setting concrete mix, and within 45 minutes it was standing straight and tall, ready for the Grandkids to come play! Looks great, great value, highly recommend this—kids from 5 to 65 will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Nauman

customer_reviews.title: Great tetherball set
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this tetherball set. I had to buy a second one when she moved to another house & they couldn't get the first one out of the ground to move with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Saylor

customer_reviews.title: Love the ball colors!
customer_reviews.text: Tetherball set is wonderful. Nice sturdy pole that doesn't wobble when you are hitting ball back and forth. The ball is a great hardness. My daughter who's 9 plays all the ti.e st school actually likes this ball better. Great product for an even better price.
customer_reviews.author: jaime

customer_reviews.title: Pole very wobbly
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to assemble but the connections at the poles are very loose and wobbly. It’s in the ground very securely, but where the second and third polls connect there’s too much wiggle room. I tried to re-order another set so I could return this one in case it was a dud, but the product is no longer available :(
customer_reviews.author: Jessamine

customer_reviews.title: Good for Children's playground
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to assemble, but that had a downside. Because the pole is in three sections, there is a wobble in the joints when assembled. It's not terrible, but makes it more suitable for small children than for teens and adults who hit more powerfully.
customer_reviews.author: R & M KYZAR

customer_reviews.title: Gentle games only
customer_reviews.text: It's good for weak upper body kids but for any one that hits it harder then a butterfly's fart it will start to round off the connections of the 3 tub connections. Also the ball and the rope sometimes disconnect if you hit hard and at the right angle. TWSS
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 4 days!!
customer_reviews.text: It lasted 4 days!! That was after putting it in the ground in concrete following the instructions and letting the concrete set for a solid week! The places where the poor connected created weak points and the pole bent immediately. I don’t recommend this for long term use. It’s great that it comes apart but it’s notnsolid enough to withstand regular play.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme Acree

customer_reviews.title: Pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: The pole doesn’t stand up with excessive play. It bent and broke after a week. However, if you have the ability to go to Home Depot, you can replace the pole, drill a hole for an eye bolt and it’s better than new. They’re still enjoying it
customer_reviews.author: J. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Rusted out and weathered quickly
customer_reviews.text: We loved the product, but had it barely a year and it rusted out finally breaking. The ball also weathered very quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Works well with concrete but not durable overall
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, but must pour concrete in base. Our unit lasts 2 months of random use. The first pole that slip into the base ended up bending and eventually splitting we cannot use it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Bullitt

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for Christmas to open....
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our kiddos so they can get more time outside! What a great Christmas idea right? The next thing we are going to get them to go with this is the glow in the dark ball.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Whited

customer_reviews.title: Takes up minimal space
customer_reviews.text: This is an all around great back yard game to have. Barely takes up any room. Our friends and family can not walk by this without hitting that ball. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kris C.

customer_reviews.title: Invest in higher quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the boys ages 8,9,12 pole bent three days after installing when on of the boys spiked the ball and flew hard around the pole. Should of known better and spent a little extra for quality. I was able to bend the pole back, which shows the weakness of it
customer_reviews.author: karen collins

customer_reviews.title: Great Quarantined Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for quarantined kids! Had a blast. Comes easy to put together. The only thing we added was a more rigid PVC 12” long, 1.5” pipe. Put in ground with some concrete. No sway!
customer_reviews.author: ESNBGA

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy for real play...
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift for my 8 year old for Christmas. By the time we actually set up and he played for 3 weeks the metal completely broke in two. May be suitable for very small children but any sort of real play causes the metal to bend and ultimately break. Unfortunately we are just outside of the return window. Very sad and disappointed in the waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: the pole snapped
customer_reviews.text: this was a waste of money, the pole snapped while the kids were playing someone could have gotten hurt
customer_reviews.author: DCK

customer_reviews.title: Very unstable at the connecting point.
customer_reviews.text: After following the instructions, we set it up and were really looking forward to having this in out home. Now cemented in the ground... but it is very unstable, it constantly shakes at the connection point and the ball often goes flying off. We now have a unsecured pole in our backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: FUN, FUN, FUN! GOOD QUALITY. LOOKS GREAT INSTALLED IN THE MIDDLE OF OUR LAWN, I CAN ALMOST BEAT MY SIX YEAR OLD.
customer_reviews.author: DH/Alice

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you have space for it as well as a bag of concrete. Love the product no regrets
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G

customer_reviews.title: Out  door item
customer_reviews.text: Item came on time, the package was in great shape, great price, granddaughter loves it she can't wait to play with it
customer_reviews.author: mary harvey

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it a zero on sturdiness i would. Played one time never recieved the replacement. I cemented the one I purchased so I couldn't return it I wanted the pole replaced and never recieved it. Very disappointed in quality. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy, broke after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: Was wobbly & no matter what we did it w fed up breaking
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Great Covid game
customer_reviews.text: the kids are having a blast with it i even played great outdoor exercise for kids
customer_reviews.author: valerie overton

customer_reviews.title: Sent me a replacement ball!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson as a Christmas present. We did not get around to setting it up until April. When I set it up I realized the ball would not hold air. They kindly sent me a replacement ball. Great customer service. My four grandchildren love to play tetherball with this.
customer_reviews.author: Silenus

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!!
customer_reviews.text: The pole itself is sturdy. But the hook on the pole to clip the tether ball rope broke off and we haven’t even had the setup for a month. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cuffe

customer_reviews.title: Quality tetherball set. Loads of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Loving our tetherball set! Easy to setup but we had to use concrete. I guess our soil is not as hard as some other reviewers who said they could use it without concrete. Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: BrZrKr

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Kids and dog all love it! Is a little bit flimsy but overall well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Celina

customer_reviews.title: I'm SO disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 9 year old nephew's Birthday who opened the package only to find 3 poles. No ball, no pump, no string! And the card wasn't even included. I'm SO disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: rpb80

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy piece of crap. Not for adults that’s for sure.
customer_reviews.author: James Rickenbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Okay for children
customer_reviews.text: After following installation instructions, the pole wasn't very sturdy for adult play. The grandkids absolutely loved it though.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Smith

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely not worth the money. Two 11 year olds bent the pole in the ground playing. Save your money. Get a solid pole this pole is a waste of concrete time and effort 💩
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: After cementing the pole in a tire this was perfect. Sturdy & tons of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Rath

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as heavy duty as I had hoped but it is working.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy C.

customer_reviews.title: it is holding up great. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old daughter loves this and plays with it hard! After 6 weeks of daily use, it is holding up great. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome story of a true American hero and role model!
customer_reviews.author: paul Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: It came with only 2 out of 3 poles! The box was also damaged. It was a birthday present, so my 8year old was very disappointed. What a let down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: was a perfect idea for grandchildren and it got them off the screen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: No paperwork or instructions were included, but was figured out. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hawley

customer_reviews.title: Fun family game
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids and I are loving it!! Still as much fun as when I was a kid!
customer_reviews.author: Patty DiMassino

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The pole is a little weak for heavy hitters. However my family is having a blast playing it.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly brown

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: We had to put in cement. It still wiggles a bit when playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Had a big party and this was a hit, no pun intended!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Sadgebury

customer_reviews.title: Great product but arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Everything came in the package and it looks pretty easy to asemble and it even came with an air pump, but it arrived damaged to the point where I can’t actually set it up. I’m going to take it to a sporting goods store to try to get it fixed.
customer_reviews.author: alexa begly

customer_reviews.title: Great tetherball set!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 11 year old grandson and he loves it! Very easy to assemble and seems quite durable. The ball and rope are good quality and have held up quite well. I like that you can disconnect the ball and bring it in out of bad weather. Great outdoor exercise! He's played with kids and adults both and everyone enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet B.

customer_reviews.title: Kids like it but doesn’t seem very durable
customer_reviews.text: It seems really flimsy. We used cement and dirt to secure in ground but it still seems to wobble a lot when my kids hit the ball. I’m afraid it won’t last long.
customer_reviews.author: BoyMom05

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Tetherball is much harder than you remember. Good quality set. We tried no concrete at first but ended up adding concrete about a week later.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Yionoulis

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product, strong and my grandkids and 4 neighborhood ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product, strong and my grandkids and 4 neighborhood kids loved it. it has held up well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received as expected. Pole is a little thin. But worth the price
customer_reviews.author: steve

product_meta.title: Park & Sun Sports Portable Outdoor Red White and Blue Tetherball Set with Accessories (3-Piece Pole), Multi
product_meta.description: The Park & Sun Sports permanent outdoor tetherball set includes everything needed for a fun and competitive playing experience. Choose between the 2-piece pole set and the 3-piece pole set; with all other components exactly the same. The 2-piece pole set is designed with premium galvanized steel that measures 1-5/8" in diameter and stands 10' 3" in height. The 3-piece pole set is also designed with premium galvanized steel and measures 1-1/2" in diameter and stands 10' 6" in height. Galvanized steel not only provides exceptional stability, it's superior at withstanding harsh weather. The poles also resist rusting, so you can enjoy the game for years to come. Each tetherball set includes a 12" in-ground pole sleeve, a heavy-duty nylon cord that measures 7' in length and 6 mm in diameter, and a compact hand pump with 2 inflation needles. Also included is a regulation sized, machine-stitched Soft Touch tetherball that features a nylon-wound bladder, an inset valve stem and an internal steel swivel hook attachment which secures the ball to the cord. The soft and durable synthetic material of the padded tetherball cover lessens the impact to hands, wrists, and arms when hit.
feature_bullets: 3-piece galvanized steel poles measure 1-1/2" in diameter; Push-button pole locking system allows for quick and easy setup
Galvanized steel provides exceptional stability and resists rusting; When assembled, the tetherball set stands 10' 6" in height
Red White and Blue Soft Touch tetherball that features a nylon-wound bladder, an inset valve stem and an internal steel swivel hook attachment which secures the ball to the cord
Durable and soft synthetic material of the padded tetherball cover lessens the impact to hands, wrists, and arms when hit
Includes a 12" in-ground pole sleeve, a heavy-duty nylon cord which measures 7' in length and 6 mm in diameter, and a compact hand pump with 2 inflation needles
Included components: 12in Ground Sleeve, Nylon Cord, Tetherball, 3-Piece Pole, Inflation Pump, Needle
